crime.

Yes, I am a criminal. My crime is that of curiosity. My crime is
that of judging people by what they say and think, not what they look like.
My crime is that of outsmarting you, something that you will never forgive me
for.

the Elements of Hiphop..

Well People here's my view on a history lesson on the movement kown as HipHop..

1 the DJ Gave the Idea a sound n Beats..

2 The MC Gave the Beats the DJ created a Voice..

3 the Graf artist gave it colour.

4 the dancer aka Breaker gave it movement n life!

Now i look at the groups 2day and think where has the heart gone the fun Vibe that the whole idea was based round??

Well there's my thought 4 the day comment if u wish actually do comment i wanna know wat u think gud or bad, remember i said MY VIEW...

another random thought is, in tryin 2 find tht old skool vibe im setting out 2 open a place where i can recreat wat once was, in shrt im lookin in 2 opening a club called E4 or 4E not sure yet but wen i am it'll happen fast lol... Fingers crossed pplz im out.

Single....

im goin 2 atempt 2 answer the question i get askd nearly everyday, now alot of ppl who will read this wont understand it but those who know me will so here goes...

First thing about me, is well i think a lil different from most "guys" as my friends know i seem 2 be really gud at giving them advice on wat they shuld do or Spice advice which i also seem 2 be gud at n yet wen it comes 2 actually finding wat im lookin 4 i honestly dont have a clue i guess i want adveture!! Sumfin or sum1 tht'll stop me dead in my tracks with A DAYUM!!! basiclly im lookin 4 my spark. The person i can wake up next 2 everyday n find somethng new 2 explore be it mentally physically or emotionally as i stated life should be full of adventure spice fun n memories...

Jess my lil huni who is the female version of me told me something which i like..
a Glance can harbour a life time of thoughts but a chance encounter can create a life time of Passion.

So there u have it a randomness of thoughts tryin 2 put it in2 something ppl will understand i may come back and revamp it or not, but i may have met this person who knows but 1 thing i do know is this i'll most likely be single till then but fate is a funny thing so i'll leave it 2 the cards...

Forever

1, 2, 3, 4..
Hey (eh)
Forever
Hey (eh)
Forever

Verse 1:
Its you, and me
Movin at the speed of light into eternity (yeah)
Tonight, is the night
To join me in the middle of ectacy
Feel the melody and the rhythm of the music around you (around you)

Bridge:
Ima take you there, Ima take you there
So dont be scared, Im right here, ya ready?
We can go anywhere
Go anywhere
But first, its your chance
Take my hand
Come with me

Its like I waited my whole life
For this one night
Its gon be me you and the dance floor
Cuz we only got one night
Double your pleasure
Double you fun
And dance forever ever ever
Forever ever ever
Forever ever ever
Forever (forever)
Ever ever ever
Forever ever ever
Forever ever ever
Forever on the dance floor

We can be two rebels
Breakin the rules
Me and you
You and I

Feel the beat inside
Im drivin, you could take the front seat (front seat)
Just need you to trust me (trust me)
Girl girl girl
Its like now

This song is for my bby grl..

i love u just the way u are...

I'm sorry if my boobs aren't big enough to "satisfy" your needs.

I'm sorry if I'm not skinny enough for you to see my ribs.

I'm sorry if I'm not pretty enough to be "your girl".

I'm sorry if I'm not tanned enough for you

I'm sorry if I'm not a playboy model so I can't act like a porn star for you.

I'm sorry that I write about you every day

I'm sorry if im not tall/short enough.

I'm sorry if I'm annoying

I'm sorry if my hair is not long enough.

I'm sorry that im different from those other girls

I'm sorry that I actually care about you and actually call to see how you're doing.

But most of all...
I'm sorry that most guys can't accept a girl for who they really are.

If you're a girl and you agree with this letter, repost as "I'm sorry".
If you're one of the FEW GUYS with enough balls to repost and you would never make your girl feel this way, repost as "I love you just the way you are"
